results.title: Effects of coadministered extended-release niacin/laropiprant and simvastatin on lipoprotein subclasses in patients with dyslipidemia.
results.text_hl: ERN/LRPT + @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ for 12 weeks produced substantial reductions in @<m>DISEASE_211750</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:211750 @@@IDL-C@@@, which was additive compared with each monotherapy.

citations.NLM: Ballantyne C, Gleim G, Liu N, Sisk CM, Johnson-Levonas AO, Mitchel Y. Effects of coadministered extended-release niacin/laropiprant and simvastatin on lipoprotein subclasses in patients with dyslipidemia. J Clin Lipidol. 2012 May-Jun;6(3):235-43. PMID: 22658147
